head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTENSTEIN, NORMAN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LICHTENSTEIN, NORMAN M.

block.p: LICHTENSTEIN-Norman M. On October 18, 2000. Beloved husband of Eleanore. Adoring father of John Lichtenstein, Nancy Kappler and David Lichtenstein. Cherished grandfather of Steven, Jeffery, Susan, Max and Mallory. Dear uncle of Marion Simon Departed. Missed and remembered for the Light. John J. Fox Funeral Home, Inc. 2080 Boston Post Road, Larchmont, NY 10538. 914-834-0144.
